description: This pair of padded wheel cases lets your road wheels travel in style. Handles allow carrying them separately. They also nest well inside the wheel pockets of the Evoc Bike Travel Case.Made of PU-coated polyester that is abrasion resistant.5mm of polyethylene foam padding buffers knocks.Polyurethane boards protect the axles.Dimensions are 70 x 5cm.
name: EVOC Road Bike Wheel Covers
